title: ISic000404. Sarcophagus of Adelphia
body:
Facsimile Images

ic Adelfia c(larissima) f(emina)
posita conpar
Baleri comitis

Apparatus criticus

Line.1: IC with no space for initial H

English translation

Here is laid to rest Adelphia, lady of senatorial rank, wife of the Count Valerius

Italian translation

Qui è deposta Adelfia clarissima femina moglie del conte Valerio

commentary

  • Tusa 1995 no.83 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001531
  • Carini 1875 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002090
  • Lamagna and Amato 2014 4, 15-19 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001892
